user.title: User
user.description: Represents a user of the application

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

monthlyDeposit.title: Monthly Deposit
monthlyDeposit.description: Represents the total deposits for a specific month.

id.description: The unique identifier for the monthly deposit (e.g., '2024-08').

date.description: The first day of the month for which the deposits are recorded.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the document was created.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.description: Represents a single deposit transaction for a customer.

monthlyLoan.title: Monthly Loan
monthlyLoan.description: Represents the loan data for a specific month.

id.description: The unique identifier for the monthly loan record (e.g., '2024-08').

date.description: The first day of the month for which the loan data is recorded.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the document was created.

loan.title: Loan
loan.description: Represents a single customer's loan state for a month.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information about a user.

/monthlyDeposits/{monthId}.description: Stores all deposit records for a given month (YYYY-MM).

/monthlyLoans/{monthId}.description: Stores all loan records for a given month (YYYY-MM).
